title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 574.2 - Vehicle registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 574.2 - Vehicle registration

State Regulations
(a) A
student, State employee or an employee of a college-related organization shall
not operate or park a vehicle of any kind or description on premises or
property under the control of the university unless such vehicle is properly
registered with the college. Proper registration includes affixing the decal
issued by the college in accordance with instructions provided. (b) Such registration shall be valid for the
regular academic year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
574.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
